about.title: a lover of tech
about.info:
Hi, I’m a full stack software developer in Winnipeg, MB and I really like technology.

From front end web and mobile development with React and React Native, to backend API's running Rails, ExpressJS. I have experience with LAMP and MEAN stacks, as well as cloud solutions like Google Cloud Platform and Firebase. Over the years I have developed a deep understanding of computer science and have applied myself in both theoretical and practical applications.

I have a passion for life, learning, and technology.

discover.title: a lover of exploration
discover.subtitle: I believe in research & discovery
discover.intro: I don't just write code. I write accessible code. Software development is my never ending journey. Therefore, I advocate for clean code, agile development, and innovative technologies to provide a modern, fast, and accessible product.
discover.summary: I don't wait for the future. I make it. Swipe left to learn more about where I have worked and what I do.

transit.title: winnipeg transit
transit.description:
Many people rely on public transit.

At Winnipeg Transit, my focus is on making real-time schedule information accessible through a variety of tools available to the public.

I function as a programmer / analyst on the Public Facing Apps team where I've gained experience with Ruby. I specialize in JavaScript technologies; specifically React and NodeJS.

In addition, I have a strong passion for emerging technologies, so I enjoylearning and testing new tools with my team.
